The file format for a Zip-packaged scenario.

Constructor Detail

ScenarioFile

private ScenarioFile()
Private constructor. Attempts to detect a zip file called Scenario.nits.

Method Detail

getInstance

public static ScenarioFile getInstance()
Retrieves the running instance of the ScenarioFile. A return value of null indicates that the member ZipFile could not be created. In this case, the ScenarioFile is useless.

Returns:
ScenarioFile : The ScenarioFile instance contained in the class.

getStream

public java.io.InputStream getStream(java.lang.String name)
Retrieves an InputStream from a given filname. A return value of null indicates that the file could not be found.

Parameters:
name - String : Attempt to get an InputStream from zipped file name.
Returns:
InputStream : The InputStream resulting from the file search.

public byte[] getByteArray(java.lang.String name)
